autooredictconv.command.odc._must_be_hol: You must be holding an item!
autooredictconv.command.odc.help.1: /odc detect - shows the tag names for the currently held item
autooredictconv.command.odc.help.2: /odc dump - lists out all item tags
autooredictconv.command.odc.help.3: /odc find <tag> - lists items with the specified tag
autooredictconv.command.odc.help.4: /odc list - lists the currently configured conversions
autooredictconv.command.odc.help.5: /odc add - Adds the currently held item as the default for all of its tags.
autooredictconv.command.odc.help.6: /odc set <tag> - Sets the currently held item as the default for the specified tag.
autooredictconv.command.odc.help.7: /odc reload - Reloads the configuration file from disk.
autooredictconv.command.odc.help.8: /odc remove [tag] - Removes either a specific tag's conversion or all conversions for tags on the held item if no tag is specified.
autooredictconv.command.odc.add: Added §6{0}§r as the default conversion for the §6{1}§r tag
autooredictconv.command.odc.add.none: §4The item has no tags (or all of its tags are blacklisted to prevent mass conversion). You may consider manually adding a direct conversion to the config file and running §6/odc reload§4.§r
autooredictconv.command.odc.remove: Removed conversion with tag §c{0}§r, if it exists
autooredictconv.command.odc.pause.invali: This command can only be run as a player!
tooltip.autooredictconv.converter.1: Pipe items into the top and out of the bottom, they will be converted within.
